import React from 'react' import {useForm} from '../hooks/useForm' const initialValue = { firstName: "", lastName: "", address: "", city: "", state: "", zip: "", }; const CheckoutForm = (props) => { const [handleChanges,values,showSuccessMessage,setShowSuccessMessage] = useForm(initialValue); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setShowSuccessMessage(true); }; return (

Checkout Form

{showSuccessMessage && (

Thank you for placing your order! Woo-hoo! 🎉

Your new items will be shipped to:



{values.firstName} {values.lastName}

{values.address}

{values.city}, {values.state} {values.zip}

)}
) } export default CheckoutForm;
